name: First US Bancshares, Inc.
description: First US Bancshares, Inc. is a financial holding company headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama, specializing in community banking services. Established in 1988, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, First US Bank, which provides a range of banking products and services to individuals, businesses, and government entities. The bank offers various services including personal and commercial loans, deposit accounts, mortgage services, and treasury management solutions. With a strong focus on customer service and community involvement, First US Bancshares aims to build lasting relationships with its clients while fostering economic growth in the regions it serves. The company is committed to leveraging technology to enhance banking experiences, offering online and mobile banking platforms that provide convenience and accessibility to its customers. As a community-oriented institution, First US Bancshares also emphasizes supporting local initiatives and contributing to the overall well-being of the communities in which it operates.

seo.meta_title: First US Bancshares, Inc. | Community Banking Services
seo.meta_description: Explore First US Bancshares, Inc. for community banking services, including personal and commercial loans, deposit accounts, and more.

faq.question: What services does First US Bank offer?
faq.answer: First US Bank offers a range of services including personal and commercial loans, deposit accounts, and treasury management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of First US Bancshares?
faq.answer: Michael C. Daugherty is the CEO of First US Bancshares, Inc.

faq.question: Where is First US Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: First US Bancshares is headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama, USA.

faq.question: When was First US Bancshares founded?
faq.answer: First US Bancshares was founded in 1988.
